thread.section_title: Arts and Entertainment coverage for all ages and interests - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: Composer Kaija Saariaho comes to Berkeley
thread.title_full: Composer Kaija Saariaho comes to Berkeley - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Joshua Kosman
title: Composer Kaija Saariaho comes to Berkeley
text:
Photo: Maarit Kytoharju Composer Kaija Saariaho Composer Kaija Saariaho
The music of Kaija Saariaho has not been entirely absent from local concert halls over the years — orchestral and chamber pieces crop up now and again at long intervals — but the next two months promise a veritable feast of her incisive and densely colored work. Composer Kaija Saariaho Composer Kaija Saariaho
The music of Kaija Saariaho has not been entirely absent from local concert halls over the years — orchestral and chamber pieces crop up now and again at long intervals — but the next two months promise a veritable feast of her incisive and densely colored work.
